QuestData.Title: Target of Opportunity: Telaar
QuestData.Description: We've received reports that the draenei enclave at Telaar has fallen to the Warsong.$B$BI sent a small group of shadow hunters to check on the situation.$B$BKajassa is their leader. Will you meet her there?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Shadow Hunter Kajassa at Telaar.
QuestData.RewardText: Glad dat Aggra send ya, Commanda.$B$BDey situation is grim, an' it's 'bout ta get grimma.
